title: Home Security System Triggered
description: The home security system was triggered. A window has been broken.

title: Vehicle Security System Triggered
description: Your nearby car has been moved.

title: Smart Fridge Temperature Warning
description: Your fridge has been running at a very low temperature which may result in supercooling. Raising the temperature will prevent this.

title: Smart Toaster Notification
description: Your toaster has been running at a high heat for 3 hours. Your smoke alarms have not been set off.

title: Fire Alarm Triggered
description: Smoke detected in your living room.
